price: (Ka ce): "An umurce ni, in bauta wa Ubangijin wannan Gari,* Wanda Ya mayar da shi Hurumi, kuma Yanã da dukan kõme. Kuma an umurce ni da in kasance daga mãsu sallamãwa."
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Wannan Gari shĩ ne Makka. Sanya Makka hurumi ba a iya shiga cikinsa da yãki yanã a cikin ashĩrai na Allah. Shiryuwa da ɓata duka asĩrai ne na Allah. Tsãrin Alƙur'ani da abubuwan da ya ƙunsa duka asĩran Allah ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā umir'tu an aʿbuda rabba hādhihi al-baldati alladhī ḥarramahā walahu kullu shayin wa-umir'tu an akūna mina al-mus'limīna
